abstract: As the sighted son of blind parents, David Snider grew up guiding them away from obstacles. They, in turn, showed him — and the world around them — lives lived fully.

headline.main: A Photographer’s Homage to His Blind Parents

snippet: As the sighted son of blind parents, David Snider grew up guiding them away from obstacles. They, in turn, showed him — and the world around them — lives lived fully.
